sentence: Nine other candidates are in the race, but the only one with significant resources is another veteran, Jonathan Hullihan, who touts the backing of far-right Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ).

Liz Cheney, who has faced intraparty censure in her home state of Wyoming over her criticism of former President Donald Trump, blasted their speaking appearance: “As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.

sentence: It’s, as you’ve indicated, speaking of evil, it’s evil as well,” Romney told CNN’s Dana Bash on “State of the Union.” Advertisement He went on to call out Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) for speaking at the third annual America First Political Action Conference, which was organized by white nationalist figurehead Nick Fuentes in Orlando, Florida.
author: Nina Golgowski
title: Sen. Mitt Romney Slams GOP 'Morons' At 'Evil' White Nationalist Conference

sentence: “Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, I don’t know them,” Mr. Romney, Utah Republican, told CNN’s “State of the Union.” “I’m reminded of the old line from the Butch Cassidy and Sundance Kid movie, where one character says, ‘Morons, I have morons on my team.’” “I would think that anybody that would sit down with a white nationalist and speak at their conference would certainly be missing a few IQ points,” he said.

title: Sen. Mitt Romney rips ‘morons’ in GOP after lawmakers address White nationalist conference

sentence: And Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, I don't know them, but I'm reminded of that old line from the 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid' movie, where one character says, 'Morons, I have got morons on my team.'
